dict.acceptation: 可是，但是；不过；然而；话虽这样说；

sent.orig: There is also a construction---especially in conversation---in which 'though' comes at the end of the sentence.
sent.trans: 还有一个结构---特别是在对话中，其中“though”在句末出现。

sent.orig: He shrugged off my crioicism as though it though it were beneath his notice.
sent.trans: 他不理睬我的批评，好像我的批评与他无关。

sent.orig: Though lies conceal everything, though lies embrace everything, but not with any help from me.
sent.trans: 虽然谎言遮天蔽日，无处不在，但是休想从我这里得到支持。

sent.orig: Though me the afflatus surging and surging, though me the current and index.
sent.trans: 透过我，灵感源源不断的奔流；透过我，潮流和指标不断涌现。
